greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 3^n mod 11: Repeat (1, 3, 9, 5, 4), period 5.
comment: Simple continued fraction expansion of 13/24 + sqrt(8761)/120 = 1.3216684472... - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 08 2012
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0, 0, 0, 0, 1).
mathematica: PowerMod[3,Range[0,100],11] (* or *) PadRight[{},100,{1,3,9,5,4}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Feb 05 2012 *)
program: (Sage) [power_mod(3, n, 11)for n in range(0, 93)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 24 2009
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, May 12 2002
